original: ha ri ti kunda la dha ra ni s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ha ri ti kunda la dha ra ni s'a dha nam /

original: 'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The practice of Hariti who holds earrings

original: aom hri:/ zhes so //ðŸ”½'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba aa pa tsha ra'i sgrub thabs la gong bzhin du rtags dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: aom hri:/ zhes so // 'phrog ma rna cha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba aa pa tsha ra'i sgrub thabs la gong bzhin du rtags dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /

original: ri'i rtse mor nyi ma re la khri phrag re bzlas la nya'i nub mo mtshan phyed kyi dus su 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri'i rtse mor nyi ma re la khri phrag re bzlas la nya'i nub mo mtshan phyed kyi dus su 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The practice of Apacari called Hariti who holds earrings. A yogi who has the signs as before should repeat this mantra ten thousand times a day on a mountain peak. At midnight on the new moon night she will come.

original: de nas 'dis nor 'bum phrag re ster ro //
analyzed: de nas 'dis nor 'bum phrag re ster ro //
translated: Then she will give a hundred thousand coins.

original: rgyab tu khur nas gling bzhi ston par byed do //
analyzed: rgyab tu khur nas gling bzhi ston par byed do //
translated: Carrying it on her back, she will show the four continents.

original: bcud la sogs pa ster ro //
analyzed: bcud la sogs pa ster ro //
translated: She will give essence and so forth.

original: rna cha 'dzin pa'i aa pa tsha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: rna cha 'dzin pa'i aa pa tsha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The practice of Apacari who holds earrings is complete.
